body_html:
In addition, did you include the change to flip the default? It's okay to leave it as a different CL if you want.

Also we need to enable more tests on GPU by setting this to True:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/image_ops_test.py#L302

You can test the GPU version with --config=cuda, and the CPU version without --config=cuda.
body_text:
In addition, did you include the change to flip the default? It's okay to leave it as a different CL if you want.
Also we need to enable more tests on GPU by setting this to True:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/image_ops_test.py#L302
You can test the GPU version with --config=cuda, and the CPU version without --config=cuda.
body:
In addition, did you include the change to flip the default? It's okay to leave it as a different CL if you want. 

Also we need to enable more tests on GPU by setting this to True: 

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/image_ops_test.py#L302

You can test the GPU version with --config=cuda, and the CPU version without --config=cuda.
